item.title: Full/Starter kit
item.description: Product # Starter kit Full kit Reachy’s torso # Front # (1) : Motors and fanâ€™s housing for Orbita neck (2) : Power board (3) : Intel NUC embedded computer (4) : Microphone (5) : USB hub (6) : Google Coral TPU (7) : Right loudspeaker (8) : Left loudspeaker (9) : Loudspeakers volume button Back # (10) : Hardware interface (see image below for details) (11) : Fixations interface

item.title: Arm kit
item.description: Product # Arm kit Reachy’s arm # (1) : 12V Power supply board (SMPS2Dynamixel) (2) : USB to serial board (Need to be connected to your computer) The arms specifications are available in section Arm mechanical specifications.

item.title: Reachy + mobile base
item.description: Reachy + mobile base is composed of two parts: a full kit Reachy robot (i.e. with two arms, torso and a head), an omnidirectional mobile base The mobile base communicates with Reachy using an USB cable plugged in Reachy’s back (see label (d) in schema Reachy’s hardware interface) For more info on what is included in the mobile base, check the mobile base specifications.
